entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the one who forgot to cast a spell on Harry's clothes. He is described as looking around and then pointing his wand at Harry to warm him up.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one whose clothes were cold and wet. Dumbledore casts a spell to warm them up for him.

relationships.description: Dumbledore helps Harry by casting a spell to warm his clothes.
